title: The Billionaire's Baby
description:
"You are MINE..."
Saint Jordan Killian Caldwell is ruthless, untouchable, and as cold as the empire he built.He doesn’t believe in love. But he needs a wife. A contract. A transaction. No emotions, no entanglements.I should have walked away. Instead, I signed my name.The rules are simple:No feelings.No complications.Just a deal we both agreed to.But as the lines blur, I see the man beneath the ice. The one who watches me when he thinks I won’t notice. The one who shields me when no one else will.I wasn’t supposed to fall for him.And he was never supposed to keep me.
author: L. Steele
